name: TrafficSoundsforSleep
0:
”Alexa open traffic sounds”
”Alexa ask traffic sounds to play for 30 minutes”
”Alexa stop”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: traffic sounds
des: Traffic is no fun when you're stuck in it, but the ambient noise of car's whizzing by is loved by many for it's help in falling asleep. Get started by saying, 'Alexa, open Traffic Sounds,' and enjoy a 30-minute session of sound. It's an excellent feature to use during sleep, for deep relaxation, meditation practices, or to help concentrate on your tasks.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
